title: What happened after King George III lost the American Revolution? - Quora
tags: King George III of the United Kingdom
History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Short answer, he went insane. He was obsessed with having lost the colonies and couldn’t take it. He eventually went blind and died in his eighties after giving the crown to his grandson.

He carried on being a very good king interested in farming, other sciences and being devoted to his family He fell ill and his son ruled for him He was a constitutional monarch like Lizzy is now , Parliament rules for him
